resources.string: Denmark, May 1945. A few days after the end of World War II, a group of German prisoners of war are forced to perform a deadly task: to disarm the two million…

Romeo, a doctor with a failed marriage, is the father of a student who must complete his final exams with the promise of a university scholarship in England if he gets good
